result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Bodily Harm or Threat to Employee of Health Care Facility or Family

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Ronald S. Johnson

defendant.name: Johnson, Ronald S.

records.addlTxt:
9:27 AM Defendant Ronald S. Johnson in court.  Attorney Karl Peter Hayes in court for State of Wisconsin. Victim rights legislation has been complied with.  Public Defender is still seeking counsel for defendant.  Bond continued.
Status hearing scheduled for November 28, 2022 at 10:45 am.
Status hearing on November 28, 2022 at 10:45 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on October 31, 2022 at 09:15 am.

10:08 AM Ronald Johnson in court. ADA Dennis Brown for the State of Wisconsin. Court questions defendant on him being late this morning. Court quashes warrant that was just issued. Court re-instates $2,500 signature bond. Bond continued.

10:05 AM Defendant Ronald S. Johnson not in court.  ADA Dennis Brown in court for State of Wisconsin. Victim rights complied with.  No victim appearing today. Court authorizes BODY ONLY warrant. State also requests that the signature bond be forfeited.
no contact DR. MT (1980), no contact with 201 Hospital Way.

1:19 PM Defendant Ronald S. Johnson appeared by video, in custody Vilas County Jail.  Attorney Karl Peter Hayes in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant confirms receipt of complaint. Right of counsel. Bond set $2500.00 signature no contact DR. MT (1980), no contact with 201 Hospital Way.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 3, 2022 at 10:00 am.
